publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1602 Richard Lochhead: Scotland’s Marine Environment—That the Parliament welcomes the Scottish Government’s commitment to consult on proposals for the sustainable management of Scotland’s seas and coast, including coherent framework measures for marine planning, conservation and sea fisheries, and believes that this will enhance Scotland’s stewardship of the seas, support sustainable development and provide protection for the marine environment, so ensuring that future generations of Scots will be able to enjoy the many social, cultural and economic benefits that the seas deliver. Supported by: Michael Russell*
